summary: Meeting focused on developing a technology roadmap for Maxim by identifying key milestones and business objectives. Discussion centered around mapping technical initiatives to higher-level business goals and prioritizing based on business impact. The team worked on whiteboarding both technical markers and their corresponding business objectives.
decisions: Structured roadmap items into technical initiatives and business objectives
Decided to frame initiatives in context of larger business goals
action_items: Map technical initiatives to business objectives
Define specific measurable goals for revenue increases
Detail implementation requirements for each initiative
concerns: Need to better understand specific revenue targets
Current manual processing in Columbia team
commitments: Create comprehensive roadmap with business impact alignment
Focus on initiatives that provide measurable business value
